law.text: The chief state school officer shall each year cause textbooks that have not been made obsolete by new adoptions and that are in need of, and have valid content justifying rebinding, to be rebound by entering into a contract with a bindery who will perform services for districts within the Commonwealth of Kentucky at a state contract price.
law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 419, sec. 15, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. IV, sec. 175, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 154, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 71, sec. 17, effective March 13, 1974. -- Created 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 178, secs. 1, 2, and 3, effective May 18, 1956.
